value:
Maybe it would be good if I tried from
time to time... On second thought, it
sounds like a pain.

This moment of quiet ought to go
on forever... *yawn* It's the perfect
sound to sleep to.

If you insist on talking to me, you
must first defeat the demon of
drowsiness—which is no easy task.

Crest versus nurture. Which causes a
noble's personality disorder? There's
a research project, eh?$k$pNow, would you find me someone
with a disorder?

Fighting holds no interest for me.
Someday, though, I might like to
become a Crest scholar...$k$pHave you heard of the Crest of
Flames by chance?

I was asked to come here and had no
opportunity to decline. So, here you
are. From $Nf.

I'd rather not kill. I don't want blood
on my hands. I just want to read a
nice book to put myself to sleep...

Honor? A foolish reason to fight.
Glory? Even worse. Let's stop this.

Is there a point to me fighting if the
result is only this unpleasantness?

Is that all you wanted with me? Well,
my nap time is coming up, so...

I'm Linhardt. I was considering
dedicating myself to Crest research
but, well... Here I am, I suppose.

I don't sleep all the time like everyone
thinks I do. I actually study more
than anything, if you ask me.$k$pI don't enjoy speaking with others,
so I like nighttime, when no one else
is around. It suits me the best.$k$pAnd then, since I'm up all night,
I end up sleeping during the day.$k$pYou're aware, are you? Well, while
we're on the subject, you're rather
active at night too, are you not?$k$pI ought to ask when exactly
you sleep.$k$pDo you have a Crest that causes
insomnia, perhaps? Mind removing
that hood and cloak so I can check?$k$pYou may have a Crest hidden
somewhere on your body...$k$pOh, not here? All right... Well, let's
go to my room then, shall we?$k$pTruthfully, I've been interested in you
for quite some time now. Wait, why
are you leaving? It's just for research!
たあっ
ほいっ
くああっ
うわああああっ
Let's get this over with.
I guess I have to.
I may as well win.
Huh. An opening.
Time for a nap...
Hmph
...Now try to stand.
I'll make this quick.
I am Linhardt. It's nice to meet you.
Say, do you know of a quiet place to take a nap?
Each person must follow their own way. This is how I prefer to live.
I have to fight in this world too? Ugh. Fine.
You do have a cute side to you.
Hmph. Battle.
Still so unsure.
I'd like to take it easy.
